live_updates: We continue to await restoration of hydro power to be restored in the affected areas. Once hydro is restored our services will begin to come online. Thank you for your patience.
Technical crews are dispatched to arrive on site to investigate this matter.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
50682.summary: Some customers in the Deer Lodge area of Winnipeg are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
50682.title: Jun 15 - Winnipeg (Deer Lodge) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)

live_updates: This issue has been resolved.  Thank you for your patience.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
50683.summary: Some customers in the Heritage Estates & The Glens area of Stony Plain are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
50683.title: Jun 15 - Stony Plain (Heritage Estates & The Glens) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)
